topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c72fef6368720b67f80400#post_54c72fef6368720b67f80400
There's a simple remedy for that.

Grab some reference pictures from online. Like faces and pose stock. Try to draw them. Fail. Look at the pictures. Indentify what you did wrong (specifically what you can tell you did wrong, you will notice more stuff easier as you get better) try to improve that part in the next drawing. Rinse repeat. 

If you practice for atleast an hour a day you will improve relatively quickly.
topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1
